function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting face-to-face surveys during a pandemic","Impact":"Risk of increasing the spread of contagious diseases by conducting surveys in person during a pandemic.","Mitigation":"Utilize online surveys or other remote data collection methods to avoid in-person contact.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, remote data collection tools.","People":"Survey respondents, survey administrators, general public.","Owner":"Research institutions, survey organizations, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of access to green spaces during a pandemic","Impact":"Potential increase in mental and physical health issues due to restricted access to green areas during a pandemic.","Mitigation":"Promote and facilitate safe access to green areas, implement virtual green space experiences, and provide mental health support services.","Technologies":"Virtual reality platforms, telemedicine, online mental health resources.","People":"Population living in urban areas, individuals affected by restricted access to green spaces.","Owner":"Local government, urban planning organizations, health agencies."},{"Description":"Economic impact on private investment in green roofs","Impact":"Reduced private investment in green roofs due to economic uncertainty during a pandemic.","Mitigation":"Provide economic incentives and support for private investment in green roofs, create financial assistance programs, and promote the economic benefits of green roofs.","Technologies":"Financial assistance platforms, economic incentive programs, green roof economic analysis tools.","People":"Private investors, urban developers, policymakers.","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations, urban planning authorities."}]}
